articles.title: Tony Boselli headlines Pro Football Hall of Fame Class for 2022
articles.description: Tony Boselli's wait for Canton is over as the Jags offensive tackle was voted in as part of a blue-collar 2022 class, Eric D. Williams writes.
articles.content:
By Eric D. WilliamsFOX Sports NFL Writer
LOS ANGELES The wait is finally over for Tony Boselli.

articles.title: Coach Dick Vermeil, tackle Tony Boselli, DE Richard Seymour headline Pro Football Hall of Fame's Class of 2022
articles.description: Tony Boselli, LeRoy Butler, Sam Mills, Richard Seymour and Bryant Young are the modern-era enshrinees. Cliff Branch, Art McNally and Dick Vermeil were also selected for enshrinement.
articles.content:
The Pro Football Hall of Fame's Class of 2022 is unique and a bit uncharacteristic.
